description: Lists your Device Defender audit listings. Requires permission to access the ListAuditSuppressions action.

parameters.name: resourceIdentifier
parameters.description: Information that identifies the noncompliant resource. deviceCertificateId (string) --- The ID of the certificate attached to the resource. caCertificateId (string) --- The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate. cognitoIdentityPoolId (string) --- The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool. clientId (string) --- The client ID. policyVersionIdentifier (dict) --- The version of the policy associated with the resource. policyName (string) --- The name of the policy. policyVersionId (string) --- The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource. account (string) --- The account with which the resource is associated. iamRoleArn (string) --- The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions. roleAliasArn (string) --- The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions. issuerCertificateIdentifier (dict) --- The issuer certificate identifier. issuerCertificateSubject (string) --- The subject of the issuer certificate. issuerId (string) --- The issuer ID. issuerCertificateSerialNumber (string) --- The issuer certificate serial number. deviceCertificateArn (string) --- The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_params.name: deviceCertificateId
nested_params.description: The ID of the certificate attached to the resource.

nested_params.name: caCertificateId
nested_params.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_params.name: cognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_params.name: policyVersionIdentifier
nested_params.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_params.name: policyVersionId
nested_params.description: The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_params.name: account
nested_params.description: The account with which the resource is associated.

nested_params.name: iamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions.

nested_params.name: roleAliasArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions.

nested_params.name: issuerCertificateSubject
nested_params.description: The subject of the issuer certificate.

nested_params.name: deviceCertificateArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_items.name: suppressions
nested_items.description: List of audit suppressions.

nested_items.name: checkName
nested_items.description: An audit check name. Checks must be enabled for your account. (Use DescribeAccountAuditConfiguration to see the list of all checks, including those that are enabled or use UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration to select which checks are enabled.)

nested_items.name: resourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Information that identifies the noncompliant resource.

nested_items.name: deviceCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate attached to the resource.

nested_items.name: caCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_items.name: cognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: The client ID.

nested_items.name: policyVersionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: account
nested_items.description: The account with which the resource is associated.

nested_items.name: iamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.description: The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: The issuer certificate identifier.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateSubject
nested_items.description: The subject of the issuer certificate.

nested_items.name: issuerId
nested_items.description: The issuer ID.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateSerialNumber
nested_items.description: The issuer certificate serial number.

nested_items.name: deviceCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_items.name: expirationDate
nested_items.description: The expiration date (epoch timestamp in seconds) that you want the suppression to adhere to.

nested_items.name: suppressIndefinitely
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a suppression should exist indefinitely or not.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the audit suppression.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
